description: Exceptions for Django-authoritative apps where TS layer performs limited Drizzle mutations. Each exception must be resolved before its expiry date.

entries.justification: Mutations via tx param (transaction passed from caller). Migrate to djangoProxy() in Phase 3.
Mutations via withRLSContext callback — org-scoped. Migrate to djangoProxy() in Phase 3.
Direct db.update on pendingProfiles/profiles — webhook handler. Migrate to djangoProxy() in Phase 3.
Direct db.insert on memberDuesLedger — payment processing. Migrate to djangoProxy() in Phase 3.
Direct db.insert(profiles) in dashboard layout — profile auto-creation. Migrate to djangoProxy() in Phase 3.
